body_html:
it looks like you have a cudnn version which is less than v5.
Can you run this command and give the output:

cat /usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cudnn.h|grep "MAJOR\|MINOR"

It should atleast have MAJOR be 5 or 6
body_text:
it looks like you have a cudnn version which is less than v5.
Can you run this command and give the output:
cat /usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cudnn.h|grep "MAJOR\|MINOR"

It should atleast have MAJOR be 5 or 6
body:
it looks like you have a cudnn version which is less than v5.
Can you run this command and give the output:

```
cat /usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/cudnn.h|grep "MAJOR\|MINOR"
```

It should atleast have MAJOR be 5 or 6
